purpose_text.para: Controls sample filtering. The filter is the logical AND of the FL, FT and FE bits. For example, if FE == 1 and FT == 1 only samples including the selected operation types and the selected events will be recorded

field_value_description.para: Record all store operations, including vector stores and all atomic operations

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FT == 0.

field_value_description.para: Record all load operations, including vector loads and atomic operations that return data

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FT == 0.

field_value_description.para: Do not record branch and exception return operations
Record all branch and exception return operations

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FT == 0.

field_value_description.para: Latency filtering enabled. Samples with a total latency less than PMSLATFR_EL1.MINLAT will not be recorded

field_description.para: If this field is set to 1 and PMSLATFR_EL1.MINLAT is set to zero, it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether no samples are recorded or the PE behaves as if PMSFCR_EL1.FL is set to 0
Filter by operation type. The filter is the logical OR of the ST, LD and B bits. For example, if LD and ST are both set, both load and store operations are recorded

field_value_description.para: Type filtering enabled. Samples not one of the selected operation types will not be recorded

field_description.para: If this field is set to 1 and the PMSFCR_EL1.{ST, LD, B} bits are all set to zero, it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether no samples are recorded or the PE behaves as if PMSFCR_EL1.FT is set to 0

field_value_description.para: Event filtering enabled. Samples not including the events selected by PMSEVFR_EL1 will not be recorded.

field_description.para: If PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0b1 and PMSEVFR_EL1 is zero, it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether no samples are recorded or the PE behaves as if PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0b0.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
